00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Openssh extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'openssh';
00041     public $User= 'root';
00042     
00043     public $NVPS= '\h';
00044     public $ConfFile= '/etc/ssh/sshd_config';
00045     public $LogFile= '/var/log/authlog';
00046     
00047     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/bin/ssh -V 2>&1';
00048     
00049     public $PidFile= '/var/run/sshd.pid';
00050     
00051     function Openssh()
00052     {
00053         global $TmpFile;
00054         
00055         parent::Model();
00056         
00057         $this->Proc= 'sshd';
00058         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/sbin/sshd > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00059     }
00060     
00061     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00062     {
00063         global $Re_Ip;
00064 
00065         if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00066             $re_user= '((invalid user\s+|)(\S+))';
00067             $re_clientip= "($Re_Ip)";
00068             $re_num= '(\d+)';
00069             $re_type= '(.*)';
00070 
00071             // Failed password for invalid user soner from 81.215.105.114 port 27836 ssh2
00072             // Failed password for root from 81.215.105.114 port 29782 ssh2
00073             // Failed none for invalid user soner from 81.215.105.114 port 40401 ssh2
00074             $re= "/Failed\s+(.*)\s+for\s+$re_user\s+from\s+$re_clientip\s+port\s+$re_num\s+$re_type$/";
00075             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00076                 $cols['Reason']= $match[1];
00077                 $cols['User']= $match[4];
00078                 $cols['IP']= $match[5];
00079                 $cols['Type']= $match[7];
00080             }
00081             else {
00082                 // Accepted password for root from 81.215.105.114 port 47179 ssh2
00083                 // Accepted publickey for root from 81.215.105.114 port 58402 ssh2
00084                 $re= "/Accepted\s+(.*)\s+for\s+$re_user\s+from\s+$re_clientip\s+port\s+$re_num\s+$re_type$/";
00085                 if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00086                     $cols['User']= $match[4];
00087                     $cols['IP']= $match[5];
00088                     $cols['Type']= $match[7];
00089                 }
00090             }
00091             return TRUE;
00092         }
00093         return FALSE;
00094     }
00095     
00096     function GetFileLineCount($file, $re= '')
00097     {
00098         $cmd= "/usr/bin/grep -a ' sshd\[' $file";
00099         if ($re !== '') {
00100             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00101             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a $re";
00102         }
00103         $cmd.= ' | /usr/bin/wc -l';
00104         
00105         // OpenBSD wc returns with leading blanks
00106         return trim($this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00107     }
00108 
00109     function GetLogs($file, $end, $count, $re= '')
00110     {
00111         $cmd= "/usr/bin/grep -a ' sshd\[' $file";
00112         if ($re !== '') {
00113             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00114             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a $re";
00115         }
00116         $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/head -$end | /usr/bin/tail -$count";
00117         
00118         $lines= explode("\n", $this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00119         
00120         $logs= array();
00121         foreach ($lines as $line) {
00122             unset($cols);
00123             if ($this->ParseLogLine($line, $cols)) {
00124                 $logs[]= $cols;
00125             }
00126         }
00127         return serialize($logs);
00128     }
00129     
00130     function GetLiveLogs($file, $count, $re= '')
00131     {
00132         $cmd= "/usr/bin/grep -a ' sshd\[' $file";
00133         if ($re !== '') {
00134             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00135             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a $re";
00136         }
00137         $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/tail -$count";
00138 
00139         $lines= explode("\n", $this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00140         
00141         $logs= array();
00142         foreach ($lines as $line) {
00143             if ($this->ParseLogLine($line, $cols)) {
00144                 $logs[]= $cols;
00145             }
00146         }
00147         return serialize($logs);
00148     }
00149 }
